    • Uses of TalonController in org.strongback.hardware

      Methods in org.strongback.hardware that return TalonController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TalonController Hardware.Controllers.talonController(int deviceNumber, double pulsesPerDegree, double analogTurnsOverVoltageRange)
      Create a component that manages and uses the hardware-based PID controller on the Talon SRX with a quadrature encoder and/or an analog 3.3V input sensor wired into the Talon.
